text: Jahan (, Urdu: , ) is a word of Persian origin meaning "world" or "universe". It is used as first name or surname in the Middle East, Central and South Asia. The Turkish rendering of the same name is Cihan. == See also == * Khan Jahan Ali * Shah Jahan * Nur Jahan * Jahan Shah * Jahan Temür * Nasreen Jahan * Shah Jahan III * Jahan Salehi * Jahan Ara Category:Persian masculine given names Category:Persian words and phrases Category:Bengali words and phrases
title: Jahan (name)
